message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $13,000. I believe this offers significant value considering its worth to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm willing to pay that price, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
I understand your position, Bob. How about we meet in the middle at $11,500? This is a fair offer considering its value.
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit above $11,500. I'm willing to go up to $11,000, but that's as high as I can go.
